snippet: Winners of a federally sponsored competition could have an inside track to billions of dollars in Hurricane Sandy relief money.
abstract: Rebuild by Design contest, held by Department of Housing and Urban Development, attracts engineers, architects, designers and others with proposals to protect the New York area from the potential damage of another Hurricane Sandy; winning proposals, which range from land use changes to building designs, could have inside track to billions of dollars in Hurricane Sandy relief money.
lead_paragraph: Winners of a federally sponsored competition could have an inside track to billions of dollars in Hurricane Sandy relief money.

headline.main: HUD Storm-Protection Competition Will Narrow Ideas Big and Small
headline.print_headline: HUD Storm-Protection Competition Will Narrow Ideas Big and Small
